---
title: "About"
---

A place for me to document what I've learned about machine learning + create materials for others to learn too.

Similar but more general to other sites I've created:

* [learnpytorch.io](https://learnpytorch.io) - Specific for learning PyTorch.
* [learntensorflow.io](https://learntensorflow.io) - Specific for learning TensorFlow.
* [learnhuggingface.com](https://learnhuggingface.com) - Specific for learning Hugging Face.

[Daniel Bourke](https://www.mrdbourke.com) makes this.
